item.title: Advent Calendar - December 1, 2025
Advent Calendar 2025
item.description: | 2019 | 2020 | 2021 | 2022 | 2023 | 2024 | 2025 | Here we are, kicking off another Advent season. It’s amazing to look back and see how far we’ve come - and none of it would have been possible without the energy, passion, and teamwork of everyone in Team PWC. Thanks for bringing the magic to life once again! MON

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 350
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 1. HEADLINES 2. SPONSOR 3. RECAP 4. PERL REVIEW 5. RAKU REVIEW 6. CHART 7. NEW MEMBERS 8. GUESTS 9. TASK #1: Good Substrings 10. TASK #2: Shuffle Pairs HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #350 of The Weekly Challenge. Welcome aboard, Alexandre Ros, an expert Uiua hacker. Surprisingly, Uiua becoming hot favourite these days. We have had three recently joined guest contributors, all choosing Uiua. Thank you, Alexandre, for sharing the first contributions in Uiua.
